Please go to the following website for detailed information:
 <a href="
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Master_with_Cracked_Fingers" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Master_with_Cracked_Fingers</a>

Here it is, the ultimate custom of the craptastic Master with Cracked Fingers, a Jackie Chan film compiled with footage from Jackie Chan's first starring film 'The Cub Tigers from Kwang Tung' and new footage to make it sell.   The result is a much funnier movie, with high jinks throughout and tighter fight scenes. Just a shame that this in the only way to see the film remastered.
 I have uploaded both the English version (this one) and the Hong Kong version in Cantonese.
 Both versions are based on the German DVD. The English version is reconstructed using the footage from the German DVD, with the majority of the footage sourced from the remastered version on the DVD and the ending from the non-anamorphic export version on the same DVD.
 The HK version has simply been demultiplexed from the German DVD and subtitles from an old hardsubbed VHS (not transferred by me).

Jackie Chan learns the martial arts from an estranged kung-fu master (Yoon Siu Tien). After some thugs kill his father and uncle, he must avenge them in the only way he knows...
